Room.Name: Necropolis Path
Room.ShortDescription: You are a path through the necropolis, with a low building to the south.
Room.LongDescription: A chill mist seems to follow you as you move along the path, and is perhaps getting a little thicker to the north. The mist seems to envelope you, making you shiver as you search through this place of the dead. A voice in the mist seems to whisper to you, "don't stray from the path, or you might become a permanent resident with us."
